publication.title: RISPP: Rotating Instruction Set Processing Platform
publication.keyword: Embedded Processor;Embedded System;High Speed;Hot Spot;reconfigurable computing;Video Codec;
publication.abstract: Adaptation in embedded processing is key in order to address effi- ciency. The concept of extensible embedded processors works well if a few a-priori known hot spots exist. However, they are far less efficient if many and possible at-design-time-unknown hot spots need to be dealt with. Our RISPP approach advances the extensible processor concept by providing flexibility through run- time

publication.title: Extracting, specifying and predicting software system properties in component based real-time embedded software development
